mapper.sql: uid, submissionid, collectionuserid, addtime, flag, backup1, backup2, backup3
mapper.insert: insert into tb_collectionsubmission (uid, submissionid, collectionuserid, addtime, flag, backup1, backup2, backup3) values (#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submissionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectionuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{backup1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backup2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backup3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
